name: Acute Diverticulitis
chief_complaint: Severe left lower abdominal pain for 2 days with fever

lab_results.CT scan: Inflamed diverticula with surrounding fat stranding

treatment: Gradual advancement to clear liquid diet
prognosis: Good recovery expected with appropriate antibiotic treatment; 70-80% respond to conservative management
description: Acute inflammation of diverticula in the colon, typically occurring in the sigmoid colon. Condition results from micro-perforation of diverticular outpouchings leading to localized infection.
